Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750000. Your acceptance would not only secure your place among the elite few who possess this extraordinary item but also allow us to foster a valuable relationship. Let's make this remarkable journey together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
